Global Responsible Sourcing Due Diligence Standard For Mineral Supply Chains - All Minerals

Version: 1.1

Description

A comprehensive standard for responsible mineral supply chain due diligence based on OECD Due Diligence Guidance, covering management systems, risk assessment, and responsible sourcing practices for all minerals except tin, tantalum, tungsten, gold, cobalt, and mica.

Conformity Criteria

  • Step 1 - Establish Strong Company Management Systems (v1)
  • Step 2 - Identify and Assess Risks in Upstream Supply Chain (v1)
  • Step 3 - Design and Implement Risk Management Strategy (v1)
  • Step 4 - Carry Out Independent Third-Party Audit (v1)
  • Step 5 - Report Annually on Supply Chain Due Diligence (v1)
  • Annex II Risk Management Requirements (v1)
